title: Braum, Gnar, or Rek'sai?
body: I'm saving up for 6,300 IP but I'm not too sure who to get. I'm a Top and Support main. I find Gnar pretty fun and good at playmaking but I also like Braum as a support since everyone loves who when you shield them from a global ult. And then Rek'sai, I find him very good at jungling but I also like the AP Rek'sai sniper (can someone confirm if Riot is really gonna change her 100% AP ratio for her Q intp a 70% ratio?).

replies.body: Get Baum{{champion:201}}  Hes op and good at saving w and e combo :D
I'd say Braum, I have Gnar and he is fun but he is just kind of hard to use because of his fury to manage. When you save your team with a Braum shield you feel so accomplished :)

Depends on where you are wanting to play. I have all three and have played Rek more since her release than any of them and I support more than any other role, but Rek has really gotten me into playing the jungle which isn't a role I played/enjoyed before. She also does well top lane. 

Gnar is very strong and fun top lane, and Braum does really well with his kit as a support tank. 

If you can't decide, def look up some gameplay vids, but I would definitely chose Rek'sai based on my games with her.
